message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.AR. 

The paper deals with the problem of optimal task offloading in mobile cloud computing over fading channels, which involves both communication and computation resources. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also proposes the use of layered coding at the physical layer, which falls under cs.IT (Information Theory). The optimization problems formulated and addressed in the paper involve resource allocation, which is a common topic in cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper also discusses the impact of channel conditions on offloading decisions, which is related to cs.AR (Hardware Architecture).
